Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_Coupon' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'exceptional_brand_ids') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_Coupon ADD exceptional_brand_ids NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL DEFAULT N''; END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_Coupon' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'exceptional_product_category_ids') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_Coupon ADD exceptional_product_category_ids NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL DEFAULT N''; END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_WorkCoupon' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'exceptional_brand_ids') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_WorkCoupon ADD exceptional_brand_ids NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL DEFAULT N''; END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_WorkCoupon' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'exceptional_product_category_ids') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_WorkCoupon ADD exceptional_product_category_ids NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL DEFAULT N''; END GO
